name: Construction in the 21st Century 10th International Conference
content: The 10th International Conference on Construction in the 21st Century (CITC-10) is hosted by the Department of Construction Management at East Carolina University, and supported by Florida International University, Auburn University, University of Wolverhampton, University of Moratuwa, Western Carolina University, City University of Science and Information Technology, and the Ceylon Institute of Builders. The mission of the CITC conferences is to facilitate communication between multi-disciplinary teams, especially those involved in engineering, management, architecture and technology Refereeing Policy and Proceedings: An International Scientific Committee of renowned experts from around the world will review all full papers. Accepted papers will be included in the ISBN numbered proceedings of CITC-10\. Acceptance will be based on quality, relevance, and originality.
